Title: Flight Training 102
Description:
Dunnae think I had nae noticed those rooks spittin' lightnin'. Sure beats tossin' hammers. But it won't mean nothin' if the Stormriders can't hit what they're fightin'.

Let's test their aim. Got some gnomish contraptions here that'll project easy targets for practice. Take Shraubendre back out there an' show them how it's done!
ObjectivesText: Help Kurdran train recruits in aerial targeting.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet Kurdran north of Golgrin's Reach
CompletionText: Flyin' takes a firm hand. An' boy do these earthen have that!
RewardText: Now, that's the stuff! Did a real number on those projectors. But what we really need is a movin' target.
